My name is Miguel Angel Cardona, Jr. I am a designer, illustrator, photographer, and front end tinkerer/developer. Currently the Lead Designer at imgix in San Francisco, CA. I was previously a Visting Professor at the RIT School for Design and a co-founder of the design agency, Dumbwaiter Design.

This site is hand coded using the Jekyll framework and makes use of imgix for on-the-fly image manipulation. I use a combination of imgix along with imgix.js, picture element and its polyfill, picturefill, for retina and responsive images.

Feel free to Drop me a line.
